subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Travis Zajac scored the first of his career-best three goals just 12 seconds in, and the Devils held on for a wild 6-3 victory at home over the Florida Panthers after nearly blowing an early three-goal lead.
snippet: Travis Zajac scored the first of his career-best three goals just 12 seconds in, and the Devils held on for a wild 6-3 victory at home over the Florida Panthers after nearly blowing an early three-goal lead.
